body: Hi Aurelien, Thanks for the reply. I'm not sure how can I solve my bigger problem for creating textile and fabric (like cotton and etc.) construction for creating thermal zones. I'd created that with HB_ EPOpaqueMat for layer [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/z6oYvgD0qBGYaP-jHJV8YhFu0Hk7AFau8MgTJxPFpRczfYqPbC8*M0I-6bssptSRY*WLUCPqQRbWfqvxbBfMWLZ69iQKes9l/Image2.png) Can anyone help me to understand the correct way? Many Thanks.
